#!/bin/bash
nvidia-smi

# Load environment
source ~/python/python/etc/profile.d/conda.sh
conda activate <env_for_condor>

export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
cd $WORK_DIR || exit 1

cmd="python -u ./tests/run_from_csv/executable.py \
    --config_path ./tests/run_from_csv/autogenerated/<autogenerated_config>.yaml"
eval $cmd
